readBook.title: Read A Book
readBook.description: Grab your favorite book and a blanket and simply unwind.

netflix.title: Binge Watch Netflix
netflix.description: It's only a binge if you watch more than six episodes at a time.

nap.title: Take A Nap
nap.description: A short 20-30 minute nap can make you feel refreshed and more alert.

candle.title: Light A Candle
candle.description: But don't let burn for too long. Try a cozy scent like vanilla.
